content:
We are looking for partners and all sorts of collaborations.#Please reach out if you are an innovator!#Airborne Wind Energy has the potential to disrupt the whole energy industry. It provides more stable energy with less down time at 10x lower cost. It will not only replace wind turbines. It will disrupt the fossil fuel industry.
#Our technology has the potential to reduce carbon emissions on a global scale, but we need you on our team to fully develop the disruptive technology.
Join us now!#Our People#

Airborne Wind Energy##10x less Materials##3-20x cheaper LCOE##3x lower Capital Cost##2.5x less Down Time##3.5x faster ROI##Start with the why:#In 1896, Swedish chemist Svante Arrhenius discovered global warming. 130 years later, the climate crisis is common knowledge. Yet, the carben emissions are still rising to new records.##Even rich modern democracies and modern technologies are still inadequate to reach net zero. We need new strategies and the clock is ticking…##We need to make big bets. Not because we love gambling, but because its riskier not to. Status quo is not an option. We need 10x improvements!##We don’t know which technologies will save the world, but we believe that Airborne Wind Energy has the potential change the world to the better!##No matter which green tech you believe in, we encourage you to develop radical 10x technologies!##Learn from the best Airborne Wind Energy Pioneers#
section: Less materials -- Lower Initial Capital Cost - Faster Return on Investment
title: Less materials -- Lower Initial Capital Cost - Faster Return on Investment

content: We are trying to connect the best ideas and discoveries from researchers, engineers, and innovators around the globe#PreviousNext
I believe we need to do things radically different#
title: Carl Lassen

content:
According to a study by Filippo Trevisi, Gianni Cassoni, Mac Gaunaa, and Lorenzo Fagiano (2025), it is most efficient to place turbines on the wing tips and rotate them inboard down. There are though many aspects that should be considered.
##Read the whole article here: Concurrent aerodynamic design of the wing and the turbines of airborne wind energy systems
title: Turbine placement and rotation direction

content: About#Timeline#December 2025Spread the wordWebsite PublishedWe need as many people as possible to work on this. Therefore, it was first priority to publish our website to spread the word and progress. November 2025PrototypeOur first kite-wingCutted, bended and glued an old election poster into the first prototype. It was unstable and without electronics. It would probably help to move the center of gravity forward.1992HistoryDeveloped countries agree to return their emissions to 1990 levels166 coutries signed the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) with the goal of "stabilization of greenhouse gas concentrations in the atmosphere at a level that would prevent dangerous anthropogenic interference with the climate system".1990HistoryGlobal warming was proved by United Nations IPCCThe IPCC Report concludes that temperatures have risen by 0.3-0.6C over the last century.1896HistoryGlobal warming was discoveredSwedish chemist Svante Arrhenius discovered global warming.
section: Less materials -- Lower Initial Capital Cost - Faster Return on Investment
Less materials -- Lower Initial Capital Cost - Faster Return on Investment
title: Contact
